title: Evaluate Cut-off Grade Strategy
description: A planning engineer evaluates the optimal cut-off grade (the grade that separates ore from waste) to maximize the project's economic value.

tasks.description: Gather the project's economic parameters, including commodity price, mining costs, and processing costs.
Calculate the break-even cut-off grade, where the revenue from the metal equals the cost of processing it.
Run a simulation using different cut-off grades to see how each one impacts the project's total tonnage, mine life, and overall NPV.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis identifies the optimal cut-off grade that maximizes the project's NPV.
